tool_description: Performs side-by-side comparison of multiple translations of the same passage, highlighting key differences in word choice, interpretation, and theological emphasis.

translations.description: Array of translation texts to compare

focus_areas.description: Specific aspects to emphasize in comparison

highlight_differences.description: Whether to emphasize differences over similarities

error_messages: Array length mismatch: translations and translation_names must have equal length.
Insufficient translations: At least 2 translations required for comparison.
Too many translations: Maximum 10 translations can be compared simultaneously.
Invalid focus area: Valid areas are [word_choice, theological_emphasis, literary_style, cultural_context].
Empty translation text: All translation texts must contain content.
usage: Provide scripture reference, translation texts, and corresponding names. Optionally specify focus areas and difference highlighting preferences. Returns detailed comparison analysis.

comparison_summary.description: Overall summary of key differences and similarities

word_choice_analysis.description: Analysis of different word choices and their implications
